features: SOFT SHAGGY RUG FOR AESTHETIC ROOM DECOR - Inspired by the desire for cozy living, Macgace Area Rugs for Living Room collection is a trendy transitional floor mats that blends chic modern design with professional construction. The plush and skin friendly fibers in each 1.7” pile are ultra soft and perfect for sinking your toes into after a long busy day. Underneath the plush is a sturdy and durable memory sponge, which is difficult to deform even after a long time of use.

NON-SLIP & NON-SHEDDING - This aesthetic rug features high-quality pile and tightly woven craftsmanship to ensure that the fuzzy rug is not shedding, fading, odorless, and the edges are difficult to come apart, which not only withstands the demands of the high-traffic areas of your home, but also maintains the comfort and softness underfoot. Thousands of non-slip rubber grippers distributed regularly on the back keep the bedroom carpet firmly attached to the floor, preventing unwanted movement.

STYLISH ROOM DECOR - This charming plush rug is ultra soft and beautiful. Its contemporary design elements harmonize perfectly with the room's furniture, effortlessly blending them together. Designed to brighten up any room in your house, whether it's the living room, dining room, bedroom, nursery, kid's room, dorm, study, or home office. You can also choose our fluffy rug as an extra touch to the holiday atmosphere, it can be Christmas decor, fall decor, Halloween decor or even birthday decor!

MULTIPLE OPTIONS - Finding the ideal long pile rug for your home is an easy job. From smoky gray to cream white- create an elegant aura with light neutral tones that set an optimal backdrop for vibrant furnishings or artistic elements. Make a dazzling statement by dialing up a sophisticated, robust coffee brown or a playful, cute pink- reminiscent of glamorous days gone by highlighted through Golden Age Hollywood movies. The profound black is the ultimate ode of minimalism and Gothic decor.

TIPS FOR CARING FLUFFY CARPET - Although this is a washable rug, its fluffy, high pile makes it unsuitable for machine washing. Routine maintenance and hand washing is a great solution, such as using a vacuum cleaner or a damp towel with detergent. It should be vacuumed at least once a week, and daily in high-traffic areas. For more professional advice please see the product descriptions below. Or if you have any other questions about the shaggy bedroom rug, please chat with us via Amazon :)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Macgace Fluffy Area Rugs - The Room Decor Aesthetic Essentials Shag rugs are back from the 1970s and feel soft and luxurious under our feet. From small floor mats to medium and large area rugs, people love the soft and long fibers of shaggy carpets, and they are gradually taking on an increasingly important role in modern home decor, found in living rooms, entryways and bedrooms. Now transform your living space into a tranquil oasis with our low-maintenance, pet-friendly shaggy rugs!

The Advantages Of Choosing Our Rugs ULTRA SOFT POLYESTER MATERIAL: This 100% polyester fluffy rug is incredibly soft and durable, also is a smart choice for any high traffic area, pet friendly space, or kid friendly home.VERSATILE IN USE: In addition to being luxuriously soft, this floor covering shag rug is incredibly versatile-grant warmth to any living room, bedroom, or powder room.NO SHEDDING: Despite its extremely thick, plush pile, this solid rug is manufactured from easy-care polyester so that shedding is never an issue.NON-SLIP DESIGN: Thousands of rug grippers dotted on the back of the rug will keep it on the floor without shifting easily. However, in order to extend the life of your rug, we would still recommend adding a rug pad to minimize wear and tear.EASY TO CLEAN: Although they are washable and easy to spot clean, we do not recommend machine washing as it may damage the rug's long pile. Routine maintenance requires only a low-speed vacuum cleaner and a light-colored, damp towel. Quite easy!

Caring for Our Shag Rug is Simple When first removed from its vacuum-sealed packaging, the long pile rugs may have a flattened or matted appearance. To return the rug to its optimal appearance, simply fluff the surface with your fingers or a brush and lay it on the floor to sit for 1-2 days.Shake the rug out to remove any loose dirt or debris.Regularly hand vacuum on the lowest setting and without the beater bar.Shedding of loose fibers is normal and will diminish over time with regular vacuuming.Blot spills immediately with a clean cloth. Apply a carpet stain remover according to that cleaner's instructions.To keep the rugs looking pristine, avoid placing them in direct sunlight or within rooms that are subject to high humidity.Use a rug pad to protect both your floors and rug from wear and tear, extending the life of your rug.

5 Colors for You To Choose From A fluffy aesthetic rug can highlight your room’s decor by reinforcing your room’s color scheme, contributing to the overarching style, and establishing the tone. In the Macgace fuzzy rug collection, you have 5 colors to choose from. Neutrals such as cream white and grey are 'go with everything' colors that are extremely well suited to minimalist or modern styles, while colors such as black, brown and pink are suitable for a variety of strong personalities depending on their different shades. Cream White Rug/Pink Rug - Suitable for those rooms with warm or bright tones, such as baby's room, girl's bedroom, birthday party hall, etc.Grey Rug - Versatile color for all kinds of rooms with cool/warm tones, whether it's a modern living room, cozy bedroom, or boy's/girl's room.Black Rug - Suitable for the dark minimalist or Gothic style rooms, perfect for strong personalities.Brown Rug - Suitable for vintage living rooms and bedrooms where there is a lot of log furniture in the space, or rooms with an fall theme.

Choosing The Right Plush Rug For You Home DECORATING THE LIVING ROOM If you're going to use a large rug for the main seating area, then you'll probably place it in the middle of the space, in front of the sofa or under the front legs. Smaller rugs can also be used to define a smaller seating area for reading or drinking coffee. DECORATING THE BEDROOM For bedrooms, you can either lay the shag carpet under the bed or elsewhere in the room, such as next to the bed, in a smaller sitting area, or in the middle of the room if that space is open. DECORATING THE KIDS ROOM You can refer to the bedroom scheme, but if there is a baby bassinet or play tent inside the kid's room, you can lay the shag rug under or beside them. It is also heartwarming to play with your kids on top of this furry area rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug. These are my go to when I can’t decided. My daughter loves it as well. The best part is how simple and easy it is to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Rug for a Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these rugs. I have ordered several and they do not shed and they look great. Super easy to machine wash and dry without any issues.

reviews.reviewerName: Nanny L. Sparks NVNanny L. Sparks NV
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I selected this rug for my Special Needs grandson's room since it looked so fluffy and nice. Their pictures made it look plush. Maybe I have a different opinion on plush. The rug fibers are soft, but I found it to be very thin in the shag and too flat. Hardly any padding so it is feels like walking on the floor. The backing is made really well. Once I had it unpackaged, the smell really got to me, had to hang in garage for several days to reduce the odor.According to their cleaning instructions, it can't go in the washing machine and my grandson does having urping issues so I am not sure how I would clean it. Wiping won't do it or vacuuming. They also state keep out of direct sunlight, and his room gets a good amount of sunshine.So, I have decided not to use it in my grandson's room for health reasons. It really isn't working for me and will probably donate later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The color is quite good! The quality is very soft. I like the style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved the rug. It was literally like 2 inches smaller in width than i needed for my living room but we made it work. Very soft and pretty. I let it sit for 2 days and it did get its normal pattern and fluffiness..loved the light pink color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me agrado lo suave que es y también el tamaño,esta bonita ,Lo que no me gustó es que es super fina al pisar es como tocara el piso no es mullida, que lastima porque esta preciosa, también he notado que es resbaladiza, otro punto negativo, No me gustó

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft- No Shedding
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised to see how light this rug is. It’s probably the lightest rug I’ve ever had. It’s super soft! I was also surprised that I haven’t seen any shedding from it. Most faux fur rugs tend to shed quite a bit. I got the white rug. It almost looks like a polar bear is on the floor. The white is super bright, and makes it look luxurious. The fur on the rug isn’t extremely thick, but it isn’t a balding head either. This rug isn’t really big- it’s about 5X3- maybe a bit smaller. So far, it doesn’t seem to dirty easily. I have a few rugs that attract dirt like magnets. This thankfully, isn’t none of them! It seems easy enough to clean, as it’s small enough and light enough to go in the wash. I’d definitely put it in the delicate cycle. If you are using a carpet cleaning machine, I’d be careful that the wet wheels don’t drag more dirt on it while cleaning it. As far as non slip, I’m using it on carpet, and it doesn’t move easily, but I don’t think it has enough grip on the bottom to stay in place if you put it on tile. I haven’t tested that out, but I have had plenty of rugs to say the least. All in all for the price, it’s a decent little rug. Better than many I’ve had like it at the same price or higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Had it for a few days now, love the color and the feeling of it but falls apart super easy
